hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
HG_NAME="services-generation-geocodeur" DIRECT_ROOT="${WORKSPACE}/${HG_NAME}/direct" UGC_STORE_PATH=/FILERS/i30a_sat3/geocoder/ugc/reftables/table-geocodage-direct UGC_TXT_ARCHIVES_PATH=/FILERS/i30a_sat3/geocoder/ugc/archives/txt/nyme rm -rf ${WORKSPACE}/${HG_NAME}
hg clone -r horscommune https://geoportail.forge.ign.fr/hg/${HG_NAME} ${WORKSPACE}/${HG_NAME}
cd ${DIRECT_ROOT}/ bash gen_ugc_nyme.sh
rm -rf ${UGC_STORE_PATH}/bdnyme-direct-validation.ugc ${UGC_TXT_ARCHIVES_PATH}/*txt # Copie de la table UGC vers la zone servie par le géoc de validation cp -pr ${DIRECT_ROOT}/gen/nyme.ugc ${UGC_STORE_PATH}/bdnyme-direct-validation-complete.ugc # Copie des txt pour analyse à postériori cp -pr ${DIRECT_ROOT}/tmp/nyme/*extract.txt ${UGC_TXT_ARCHIVES_PATH}/
# For cron watch echo "bdnyme-direct-validation-complete" > ${UGC_STORE_PATH}/delivernyme.please
## delivery of prod validation for MACHINE in "tpgppv01s" "tpgppv02s" do ssh $MACHINE "sudo stop_service geocoder.ign.fr 2>&1" ssh $MACHINE "cd /MIDDLE/gpp3/geocoder.ign.fr/ugc/reftables;unlink PositionOfInterest.ugc;ln -s ./table-geocodage-direct/bdnyme-direct-validation-complete.ugc PositionOfInterest.ugc" ssh $MACHINE "sudo start_service geocoder.ign.fr 2>&1" sleep 10 done
#rm -rf ${WORKSPACE}/*
